products.title: MAISON MARGIELA
products.description: Maison Margiela's 'Replica' sneakers are modelled after Austrian running shoes from the '70s. Made from a combination of white leather and light-grey suede, this pair has gripped rubber soles and internal straps so they fit securely.

products.title: KAPITAL
products.description: KAPITAL’s designs are a cool way to update your wardrobe. These 'Katsuragi' trousers are cut from cotton-twill with panelled double knees that nod to utility styles. The thick, woven drawstring adds a point of contrast.

products.title: BALENCIAGA
products.description: Balenciaga's zip-up hoodie has contrasting panels and textured ribbing inspired by classic motocross styles. Printed with a logo front and centre, it's made from heavyweight cotton-jersey and faded to look vintage.

products.title: SALOMON
products.description:
Salomon's innovative footwear is designed with world-class performance in mind.
- First introduced in 2013, these updated 'XT-6' sneakers have streamlined mesh uppers that are reinforced with TPU for durability
- Agile Chassis™ system works alongside Contagrip® soles for stability and maximum grip

products.title: ACNE STUDIOS
products.description: Acne Studios' faded '2023M' jeans are heavily whiskered to create the look of rippling water. Detailed with signature pink bartack stitching at the back, they're cut for a wide-leg fit from organic denim and have elongated legs meant to pool at the floor.

products.title: CELINE HOMME
products.description: Designed with contrasting raglan sleeves and a slightly cropped hem, CELINE HOMME's T-shirt takes cues from vintage sportswear. It's cut for a slim fit from cotton-jersey and printed with the moniker across the chest.

products.title: LOEWE
products.description: The turned-up cuff on Loewe's beanie is embroidered with the house's name in a blurred font. Naturally warm, it's knitted from medium-weight wool in a chunky ribbed stitch.

products.title: MAISON MARGIELA
products.description: Maison Margiela's cult 'Tabi' split-toe shoes pay homage to traditional Japanese worker footwear dating back to the 15th century. These Chelsea boots are crafted from patent-leather and set on chunky lug soles that provide plenty of traction. Wear yours with tailoring or denim.

products.title: ACNE STUDIOS
products.description: Acne Studios' leather jacket has a crumpled appearance that makes it feel authentically lived-in. It's detailed with a point collar, two welt pockets and a streamlined concealed zipped placket.

products.title: ACNE STUDIOS
products.description: Acne Studios' wide-leg '1981M' jeans are designed to sit low on the waist. They're cut from pure denim and have a black wash with light fading and whiskering.

products.title: VISVIM
products.description: visvim's hoodie is made from Sea Island cotton-jersey - a material prized for its resilience and soft handle. It's cut in an 'Ultimate Jumbo' fit and backed in warm fleece.

products.title: BOTTEGA VENETA
products.description: Bottega Veneta reinterprets a classic with its modernist sensibility. Riffing on military styles, these boots are made from polished black leather and finished with oversized pull tabs and chunky lug soles.
